resources.string: Name the woman in tech being described. Use their full name e.g. "Megan Smith" not just "Smith"
1. I am an English mathematician known for my work on the Analytical Engine (invented by Charles Babbage).
2.I was a film actress and inventor who helped invent frequency hopping.
3.I was the Navy Rear Admiral credited with inventing the first compiler and the term debugging.
4.I am said to be the first female video game designer. I programmed the game River Raid at Activision.
5.I was an American computer scientist who developed the FORMAC language in 1962
